itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Monk's Branch requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Mediah Fishing Rod
item.desc: Ash tree float. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Calpheon Fishing Rod
item.desc: Calpheon fishing rod. ...And it was super effective!\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Epheria Fishing Rod
item.desc: Epheria fishing rod. It is sturdier than other rods.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Yuria Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Krea Staff
item.desc: A staff crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Azwell Staff
item.desc: A staff custom-made for the commander of the Militia.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Staff
item.desc:
A Seleth staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Seleth staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:

It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.name: Grade 2 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 2nd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.
